reviews.review_msg: exams are tough. he will tell you 5 minutes before the exam that the exam is NOT easy and expect it to be hard. that really set the mood for students before they had to write a 30% exam. NOT a nice guy. he's condescending when you ask fair questions & treats you like an idiot. he asks really random and insignificant questions on the exams. AVOID

Jon's lectures are extremely helpful when you have no motivation to read the texts. His examples reflect relatable situations and his jokes are hilarious. Take this course, and expect to have a class you do not want to miss.
oops last post had a typo. had him fall 07..not 08!

Had Jon as a TA fall 08. great TA! was very helpful. always available to go over papers and questions about exams. very fair marker. serious students (i.e., non-slackers) will appreciate his interest and knowledge about crim theories.
Awesome TA, extremely helpful, and fair marker.
Didn't find him very helpful, or available for help, however I took the class through Distance ed, so maybe he's a better teacher in an actual class.

Very reasonable. I kept up with the readings and paid attention to what he highlighted from the text in class; got an A-....Guest speakers and movies were actually interesting and very informative.  I loved this class and i highly recommend it. Keep up, pay attention in class and you'll do well. Oh yeah and MacArthur is an awesome T.A. -   AA
He talks straight out the textbk so nothing new there, but extra materials e.g videos and guest speakers were great.MacArthur the TA is the best! Very interesting and knowledgable!Fun course to take
We call the prof. (Hot Jon) cuz... he is a total hottie.  Oh yeah and the class is pretty cool too!
jons cool, if you can take this class then do it.   definitely a gpa booster.  and the ta's pretty  cool too.

Jon has been my favorite prof so far.  He is very nice and is more like a friend than a teacher.  Field Trips are definitely worth it.  Course is rather straight forward.  I think Jon is very insecure (we used to call him 'battered sheep") but he shouldn't be because he is awesome.

Very nice and approachable. Field trips to prisons,speakers, videos were GREAT. Lectures were quite boring, notes straight from the text. other than that, a fun class, not too hard as long as you read the text. DONOT MISS THE TRIPS WHEN ELSE WILL U GET ANOTHER CHANCE2 VISIT A PRISON AND TALK2KILLERS

Amazing class.  Jon made it really interesting by bringing in speakers and movies instead of lecturing boring material everyday.  This is the first class where I have actually looked forward going to it.
really good notes and lectures were fun. had guest speakers and watched a clip from tupac too. the prison trips were awesome, easy marking and nice TAs. good class. the prof is soooooo hot too!
Class material is interesting and the fieldtrips to the prisons are lovely. The tests are pretty easy if you've read the textbook/looked over your notes. His marking isn't too hard, either.
